nodes.text: Xirl was a jungle planet located in Wild Space, near the Kalidorn system. The Stinker was a long living creature that was native to Xirl. The female human Gozetta built a hunting lodge on Xirl. The planet was a source of messages piggy-backing on official channels, calling on people to resist the Galactic Empire.
Xirl first appears in the Adventures in Wild Space series by Cavan Scott.
